tag.name: cftrace

parameter.name: abort
parameter.help: Calls cfabort tag when the tag is executed

parameter.name: category
parameter.help: User-defined string for identifying trace groups

parameter.name: inline
parameter.help: Displays trace code in line on the page in the location of the cftrace tag, addition to the debugging information output.

parameter.name: text
parameter.help: User-defined string, which can include simple variable, but not complex variables such as arrays. Outputs to cflog text attribute

parameter.name: type
parameter.help:
Corresponds to the cflog type attribute; displays an appropriate icon.
* Information * Warning * Error * Fatal Information

parameter.name: var
parameter.help:
The name of a simple or complex variable to display.
Useful for displaying a temporary value, or a value that does not display on any CFM page.
